sn55.37:1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling among the Sakyans at Kapilavatthu in Nigrodha's Park. Then Mahānāma the Sakyan approached the Blessed One, paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said to him:
sn55.37:2: "Venerable sir, in what way is one a lay follower?"
sn55.37:3: "In what way, venerable sir, is a lay follower accomplished in virtue?"
sn55.37:4: "In what way, venerable sir, is a lay follower accomplished in faith?"
sn55.37:5: "In what way, venerable sir, is a lay follower accomplished in generosity?"
sn55.37:6: "In what way, venerable sir, is a lay follower accomplished in wisdom?"
